ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who do not have iman in the Next World give the angels female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels names of females.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Those who do not believe in the Hereafter give angels the names of females,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Only those who do not believe in the life hereafter call the angels, females. They have no knowledge about it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those who do not believe in the Hereafter, coin the names of angels like those of females.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who believe not in the Hereafter, name the angels with female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely they who do not believe in the hereafter name the angels with female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those who do not believe in the world to come name the angels with the names of females.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it is those who disbelieve in the Hereafter who name the angels with the names of females.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who do not believe in the life to come call the angels by female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who believe not in the Hereafter name the angels with the names of females.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those who do not believe in the Hereafter give female names to the angels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who believe not in the Hereafter, name the angels with female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, those who believe not in the Hereafter, name the angels with female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who disbelieve in the Everlasting Life call the angels by female names.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels the names of females.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:27] Truly those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels the names of females, for they say: ‘They are God’s daughters’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! it is those who disbelieve in the Hereafter) in resurrection after death, i.e. the disbelievers of Mecca (who name the angels with the names of females) they make them Allah's daughters.
